name: Deadly Dog-Dating Dungeon
description:
The Deadly Dog-Dating Dungeon. The name says it all, but also very little. Apparently, Momiji has been cursed by an irresponsible sage, and now any time someone gets too close, they're teleported with her to the... well, the Deadly Dog-Dating Dungeon. Momiji and Nitori must solve puzzles, fight baddies, and occasionally flirt on this (apparently) romantic excursion into a surreal alternate dimension.

Currently there is no save system. I'm workin' on it

Playing with a controller is highly recommended!

NOTE: contains a few fixes made after the submission deadline to resolve some crashes and softlocks

Controls (keyboard):

A - Jump (in battle) / Grapple (out of battle)

S + direction  - Attack

D + direction - Special moves

Q/E - Dash left or right (in battle) / Hold to run (out of battle)

Enter - Pause, skip cutscenes

A Touhou Project fangame made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 3

Art & Code - Fiore

Sound Effects - Gubbles

Music - Miles
